Watering reduces the risk of disease occurring at the end of that growth cycle by varying amounts.[1] During the next growth cycle, the plant moves from being watered back to normal and becomes at higher risk for disease once more, unless it is watered again.

Watering cans are used in the farming skill to water allotment, flower, and hops patches, as well as to water seedlings to grow saplings. Watering reduces the risk of disease occurring at the end of that growth cycle by varying amounts.[1] During the next growth cycle, the plant moves from being watered back to normal and becomes at higher risk for disease once more, unless it is watered again.

A watering can holds eight doses. It can be refilled at any water supply (except wells), by using a bucket of water or jug of water on it, or by casting Humidify. Gricoller's can, an untradeable reward from Tithe Farm, holds 1,000 charges.

Watering cans can be bought from farming shops, obtained as a drop from farmers, or withdrawn from a tool store 5.

Watering cans with water inside can be used to extinguish the flame walls in the Chambers of Xeric.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 July 2005
(update)

The items' examines were changed from "Farming skill coming in July!".

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 16 December 2019. (Archived from the original on 16 December 2019.) Mod Ash: "It just reduces it." "There isn't a formula as far as I know - the dev who made the skill just set different numbers. And I'm afraid the nature of how he encoded his data makes it rather hard to go look them all up on request."

'''Watering cans''' are used in the [[farming]] skill to water allotment, flower, and hops patches, as well as to water seedlings to grow [[sapling]]s. Watering reduces the risk of disease occurring at the end of that growth cycle by varying amounts.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1206382608466268160|date=16 December 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.ph/OzPlm|archivedate=16 December 2019|quote=It just reduces it." "There isn't a formula as far as I know - the dev who made the skill just set different numbers. And I'm afraid the nature of how he encoded his data makes it rather hard to go look them all up on request.|name=Watering can tweet}} During the next growth cycle, the plant moves from being watered back to normal and becomes at higher risk for disease once more, unless it is watered again.

A watering can holds eight doses. It can be refilled at any water supply (except wells), by using a [[bucket of water]] or [[jug of water]] on it, or by casting [[Humidify]]. [[Gricoller's can]], an untradeable reward from [[Tithe Farm]], holds 1,000 charges.

Watering cans can be bought from [[farming shops]], obtained as a drop from [[farmer]]s, or withdrawn from a [[tool store 5]].

Watering cans with water inside can be used to extinguish the flame walls in the [[Chambers of Xeric]].
